## ðŸ”’ The Bitcoin Chronicles - A.0 - Book 0.8 - The Incorruptible Witness

Bitcoin does not judge, redeem, or forgive. It witnesses. For the first time in history, humanity lives under a record that cannot be persuaded, revised, or made to forget.

Bitcoin does not judge, redeem, or forgive. It witnesses. For the first time in history, humanity lives under a record that cannot be persuaded, revised, or made to forget.
